summary: The meeting focused on how to effectively record training sessions or webinars on Zoom while managing participant visibility. The speaker demonstrated the use of spotlight and speaker view to ensure a professional recording experience.
key_points: Use spotlight to highlight the main speaker during recordings.
Switch to speaker view to ensure only the active speaker is visible.
Avoid gallery view unless all participants are comfortable being recorded.
Participants can be spotlighted when they are speaking alongside the main speaker.

decisions.decision: Keep the recording on speaker view and spotlight the main speaker.

action_items.task: Demonstrate the process of spotlighting participants during a session.
Ensure all participants are aware of the recording settings before the next session.

next_steps: Implement the discussed recording techniques in upcoming training sessions.
